page.description: The following Tabbed Control properties can be changed at run-time. After any operation that changes the size of the control or placement of the tabs, you should reset the control's height or width, either to the same or a new value, to complete the operation.

case.title: Object Name
case.description: The name of the control.

case.title: Tab Placement
case.description: Sets the location of the tabs on the control. Possible values are: "top", "bottom", "left", "right".

case.title: Tab Style
case.description: Sets the style of the tabbed control's corners. Possible values are: "Round corners", "Square corners", "Angled sides".

case.title: Tab Appearance
case.description: Sets the style of the tabs' labels. Possible values are: "text", "bitmap", "text&bitmap", "bitmap&text", "text/bitmap", "bitmap/text".

case.title: Printable
case.description: Determines whether the tabbed control is printable.

case.title: Tab Stop
case.description: Determines whether you can tab to the control.

case.title: Disabled
case.description: Enables or disables the tabbed control.

case.title: Hide
case.description: Displays or hides the tabbed control.

case.title: Horizontal Text
case.description: When tabs are positioned to the left and right sides of the tabbed control, Alpha Five rotates the tab labels so they are written vertically. The horizontal text setting forces text to be written horizontally, regardless of the location of the tabs.

case.title: Fixed Tab Width
case.description: Determines whether all tabs will have the same width, or will be sized to fit their labels.

case.title: Always on Top
case.description: When checked the control is always on the top-most level of the form layout. No other form elements will over lap it.

case.title: Transparent Background
case.description: Sets the fill color of the tab control to transparent.

case.title: Bold Current Tab Label
case.description: Sets the character styles used for the tabs' text labels. .Tab_bold_current only works if .Bold is set to FALSE.

case.title: Tab Height Tab Width
case.description: Sets the width and height of the tab control's tabs. . Width is only used when .Tab_fixed_width is set to TRUE.

case.title: Side Angle
case.description: Sets the slant of the tabs' sides. .Width_delta is only used when .Tab_style is set to "Angled sides".

case.title: Tab Text
case.description: Sets the text label of a tab.

case.title: Selected Color Unselected Color Page Color
case.description: Sets the colors of the tab control's body and tabs in selected and unselected modes. Refer to A5.COLOR_ENUM().
case.example: :formname.controlname.Tabs.SheetN.Pagecolor as C :formname.controlname.Tabs.SheetN.Selectedcolor as C :formname.controlname.Tabs.SheetN.Unselectedcolor as C

case.title: Change Image
case.description: If the style of the tab label uses an image, the Change Image button is enabled. Sets the image used for the tab's label. A replacement image must be from the same library as the original image.

case.title: Face
case.description: Sets the font.

case.title: Size
case.description: Sets the point size.

case.title: Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikeout
case.description: When checked set the named attribute.
case.example: :formname.controlname.tabs.font.bold as L :formname.controlname.tabs.font.italic as L :formname.controlname.tabs.font.strikeout as L :formname.controlname.tabs.font.underline as L

case.title: Color
case.description: Sets the text color.

case.title: Left
case.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control.

case.title: Top
case.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width of the control.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height of the control.

case.title: Anchor
case.description: Determines the way the tabbed control will or will not stretch as the base form is resized. Possible attachment points are: 1 = top and right 2 = top, left, and right 4 = bottom and left 5 = bottom and right 6 = bottom, left, and right 8 = top, bottom, and left 9 = top, bottom, and right 10 = top, bottom, left, and right
